docs.text: Peter Luro Personal Microsite About Me I am a Software Engineer with over three years of professional experience developing ML pipelines and automating tasks in azure cloud. I have also developed Jenkins automation pipelines, which run scheduled security checks on various pieces of architecture in all of the organization's projects. Other pipelines include automating the deployment of Kubernetes resources, such as APIs which can interact with other services and deployments. Education Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, GPA: 3.65/4.0 Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI)
